Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥ
Entry.EnglishText: Walto

Entry.JapaneseText: サレ
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <Leader>
Entry.EnglishText: <Leader>

Entry.JapaneseText: 獣王山
Entry.EnglishText: Mount Sovereign

Entry.JapaneseText: 獣王山
Entry.EnglishText: Mount Sovereign

Entry.JapaneseText: この先です。
Entry.EnglishText: The front entrance is just up ahead.

Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアスの身体が眠る 聖所ってのが、ここにあるんだな？
Entry.EnglishText: So this is the sanctuary where Geyorkias's body is supposed to be, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: はい……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちは…… そのゲオルギアスを 復活させるためにここへ来た……
Entry.EnglishText: And we've come all this way to bring him back to life...

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、この先、 何が起こるかわからない……
Entry.EnglishText: From now on, anything could happen.

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、 また言うんじゃないでしょうね？ オレが死んだら……なんて。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh no. Are you going to start going on another "If I die..." spiel?

Entry.JapaneseText: 違う…… オレが言いたいのは……
Entry.EnglishText: No, what I want to say is...

Entry.JapaneseText: 必ず戻って来よう。 全員で。
Entry.EnglishText: We're going to get through this. Every last one of us.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれが……ユリスの領域か！ 絶対にぶっつぶしてやろうぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: That must be... Yuris's Realm! Let's raze it to the ground!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ。一気に乗り込むぞ！ ……シャオルーン頼む！
Entry.EnglishText: Right, let's march on in! Shaorune, you know what to do!

Entry.JapaneseText: うん……行くよっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Okay, here we go!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんという事だ……
Entry.EnglishText: What in the world...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あの中で、<Veigue>たちが 戦ってるのね……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and his friends are fighting in there as we speak, aren't they?

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしたちは、ここで 待つしかないというの……？
Entry.EnglishText: Do we really have no choice but to wait here?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私……<Veigue>のところに行きたい…… 一緒に戦いたい……
Entry.EnglishText: I... I want to be with <Veigue>. I want to fight alongside him.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしも同じ気持ちです。 カレギアの王として…… 彼らの仲間として……
Entry.EnglishText: I share your sentiment. As the Queen of Callegea... and also as their friend.

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ様……
Entry.EnglishText: Queen Agarte...

Entry.JapaneseText: せめて、彼らの無事と幸運を 祈りましょう……
Entry.EnglishText: At the very least, we should pray for their safe return.

Entry.JapaneseText: はい……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これは……!? 陛下、お下がりください！
Entry.EnglishText: What is this?! Stand back, Your Majesty!

Entry.JapaneseText: 呼んだかい、 クレア、アガーテ？
Entry.EnglishText: You called for me, Claire, Agarte?

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune?!

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune?!

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン？
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune?

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫！ シャオルーンは水の聖獣です。 敵じゃありません！！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't worry! Shaorune is the Sacred Beast of Aqua! He's not an enemy at all!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣？ これが……!?
Entry.EnglishText: This is... a Sacred Beast?!

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン、 なぜあなたがここに？
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune, why have you come here?

Entry.JapaneseText: キミたちの願いが ぼくの胸に届いたのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Because your desires have reached my heart!

Entry.JapaneseText: それでは…… わたくしたちをあの場へ、 連れて行ってくれるのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Then, I ask of you... Would it be possible for you to take us there?

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下、なりません。 危険すぎます。
Entry.EnglishText: Your Majesty, you mustn't. It is far too dangerous.

Entry.JapaneseText: 止めても行きます。 どんな危険な事があろうとも、 逃げるつもりはありません。
Entry.EnglishText: I will go whether or not you try to stop me. I have no intention of running away from whatever perils lie ahead.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしは…… この国の王ですもの……
Entry.EnglishText: After all... I am this nation's Queen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私も行きます。 <Veigue>の力になりたいから…… 仲間たちが戦ってるから……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm going as well. I wan't to help <Veigue> in any way I can... Because these are my friends fighting...

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下……クレアさん……
Entry.EnglishText: Your Majesty... Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: お願い、行かせて…… ミルハウスト……
Entry.EnglishText: Please, Milhaust... Let us go...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……私もお供します……
Entry.EnglishText: I will accompany you, then.

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、行くよ！
Entry.EnglishText: All right, let's go!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここの警備は確かに重要だが、 ここだけの話、退屈だ……
Entry.EnglishText: This place requires the utmost security, but just between you and me, it sure is boring around here...

Entry.JapaneseText: これだけの人数を警備に置くには 理由があるのだろうが、我々には 何も知らされない。
Entry.EnglishText: There has to be a reason why so many people are posted on guard duty here, but we have no clue as to why.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここの存在すらあまり知られて いないというのに……正直、 他の任務に移りたい……
Entry.EnglishText: People barely even know of this place's existence... Honestly, I'd rather be placed somewhere else...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが何用だ？ 侵入しようとするならば、 こちらも黙ってはいないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: What are you Huma doing here? I'm not going to let you get away with any trespassing.

Entry.JapaneseText: 遠くから聞こえるこの音…… どこかで何かが起きているかも しれないというのに……
Entry.EnglishText: I hear a sound from afar... I guess something must be happening somewhere else...

Entry.JapaneseText: この獣王山はいたって平和だ。 おそらく未来永劫に平和だ。 ふわぁぁ……眠い……
Entry.EnglishText: Mount Sovereign sure is peaceful. Surely this peace will last for forever. Boy, am I sleepy...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは王家の聖なる場所だ。 それ以上の事は、我々も知らない。 速やかに退去せよ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the holy sanctuary of the royal family. I don't know anything beyond that. Get out of here now.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは初代ゴルドバ王が お眠りになられる王家の聖所だ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the royal sanctuary where the founding king, Goldba, is laid to rest.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは初代ゴルドバ王が お眠りになられる王家の聖所だ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the royal sanctuary where the founding king, Goldba, is laid to rest.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの王がお眠りになられる 王家の聖所に、ヒューマふぜいが 何用か！ 今すぐ去れ！
Entry.EnglishText: What business do Huma have here at the resting place of our Gajuma kings?! Leave at once!

Entry.JapaneseText: この不快な音が、ゴルドバ王の 眠りを妨げねば良いが……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope this horrid noise doesn't disturb the sleep of King Goldba...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは初代ゴルドバ王が お眠りになられる王家の聖所だ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the royal sanctuary where the founding king, Goldba, is laid to rest.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一般市民の立ち入りは禁止されている。 ここで問題を起こせば、国家反乱罪が 適用される。ただちに立ち去れ。
Entry.EnglishText: Entry here is forbidden to the general public. If you cause a disturbance here, you will be charged with treason. Leave immediately,

Entry.JapaneseText: 一般市民の立ち入りは禁止だ。 ただちに立ち去れ。
Entry.EnglishText: Entry here is forbidden to the general public. Leave immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが王家の聖なる場所に 何用か！ ただちに立ち去れ！ さもなくば拘束するぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: What business do Huma have at the royal family's sanctuary?! Leave immediately! Otherwise, I'll have you arrested!

Entry.JapaneseText: 地鳴りがしようが 嵐が来ようが関係ない。 ただちに立ち去れ。
Entry.EnglishText: It doesn't matter if there's an earthquake or a storm coming. Leave immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一般市民の立ち入りは禁止されている。 ここで問題を起こせば、国家反乱罪が 適用される。ただちに立ち去れ。
Entry.EnglishText: Entry here is forbidden to the general public. If you cause a disturbance here, you will be charged with treason. Leave immediately,

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは王家の聖なる場所。 我々もそれ以上の事を知らない。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the sanctuary of the royal family. I don't know much besides that, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは王家の聖なる場所だ。 それ以上の事は、我々も知らない。 速やかに退去せよ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the sanctuary of the royal family. I don't know much besides that, though. Leave immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは我らがガジュマの王の 聖なる場所だ！ ヒューマが 近寄って汚す事は許さん！
Entry.EnglishText: This is the holy sanctuary of our Gajuma kings! I won't allow you Huma to sully it with your presence!

Entry.JapaneseText: 我々の任務は獣王山の警備。 任務に関係のない音の事など 関係ない。
Entry.EnglishText: We're here to guard Mount Sovereign. This rumbling has no bearing on our task.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは王家の聖なる場所だ。 それ以上の事は、我々も知らない。 速やかに退去せよ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the sanctuary of the royal family. I don't know much besides that, though. Leave immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 止まれ。 この先は王家の聖なる場所だ。 一般の者の立ち入りは禁止している。
Entry.EnglishText: Halt. Beyond this point is the sanctuary of the royal family. Entry from the general public is prohibited.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……行くぞ、みんな。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go, everyone.

Entry.JapaneseText: この先は王家の聖域。 お引取り願いましょうか。
Entry.EnglishText: You are approaching the sanctuary of the royal family. I think it would be in your best interests for you to turn back.

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様の命により、 獣王山に侵入する敵を 排除します。
Entry.EnglishText: On Lady Zilva's orders, I will eliminate all hostiles who trespass on Mount Sovereign.

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下……
Entry.EnglishText: Your Majesty...!

Entry.JapaneseText: そのジルバが 間違っているとすれば……？
Entry.EnglishText: And if Zilva is in the wrong?

Entry.JapaneseText: ハハハハハ…… 笑わせてくれるじゃ ありませんか。
Entry.EnglishText: Ahahaha! Are you trying to make me laugh?

Entry.JapaneseText: 国がメチャクチャになった そもそもの原因を作ったのは 誰でしたっけ？
Entry.EnglishText: Now, just who was it that made a mess of this Kingdom in the first place?

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに、この混乱の非は、 わたくしにあります。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, it is true that I am the cause of all this...

Entry.JapaneseText: だからこそ、わたくしには それを正しい方向へと導く 責任があるのです。
Entry.EnglishText: And that is precisely why I must take it upon myself to guide this nation down the correct path.

Entry.JapaneseText: 田舎娘の姿をしたあなたに 何ができます？
Entry.EnglishText: How do you plan on doing that, considering you look like nothing more than a country girl?

Entry.JapaneseText: この国で今一番偉いのは ジルバ様なんですよ？
Entry.EnglishText: As of now, is the most important person in this country not Lady Zilva?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>ひとりの力が どれだけ強いのか…… あなたは知らないのです。
Entry.EnglishText: You are unaware of the influence that a single <Yellow>Human<White> being can hold.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしも、それを 知らないでいました。 ずっと……
Entry.EnglishText: I, too, was ignorant of that for a long time.

Entry.JapaneseText: それが<Yellow>ヒト<White>の心の力って ヤツですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you talking about the power of the <Yellow>Human<White> heart?

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら僕は、 それを踏みにじるまでさ！ ごきげんだなぁ……ハハハ……
Entry.EnglishText: Well in that case, I'll just have to trample it beneath my feet until there is nothing left! What a joy that will be! Ahahaha!

Entry.JapaneseText: サレ、てめぇ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh, you bastard!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐあっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Guaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわあっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Uwaaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぬうん!!
Entry.EnglishText: Uugh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Uwaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: くっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Ngh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃあっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 派手に盛り上がったところで、 白黒つけようじゃないか。
Entry.EnglishText: Now that things are getting exciting, wouldn't you say it's time to settle matters once and for all?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今度こそキミたちを…… ぶっ殺してあげるよ！
Entry.EnglishText: This time, I'll make sure to finish you off!

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな、いくぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Let's do this!

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜだ……なぜ勝てん……
Entry.EnglishText: How... How could they have won...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>の強さを決めるのは フォルスや武器なんかじゃない……
Entry.EnglishText: What decides someone's strength is not their Force of their weapons...

Entry.JapaneseText: 心の強さ……心の力だ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's the power of their heart!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Yellow>ヒト<White>の心……認めない…… 僕は絶対…… そんなものは認めないぞッ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Human<White> heart... It can't be... I will never... accept that!

Entry.JapaneseText: そこまでだ、ワルトゥ。 これ以上、おまえと戦いたくない。
Entry.EnglishText: That's enough, Walto! I no longer wish to fight against you.

Entry.JapaneseText: この国を守るために…… あなたたちを倒す……！
Entry.EnglishText: I have to defeat you... to protect this kingdom!

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜだ？ おまえはわかっていたはずだ。 ジルバに従う事が、 正しい道ではないと。
Entry.EnglishText: But why? You of all people should know by now that following Zilva is not the correct course of action!

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下ご不在の今、 この国を守っているのは ジルバ様……
Entry.EnglishText: Lady Zilva is the one maintaining this kingdom in Her Majesty's absence...

Entry.JapaneseText: ならば、カレギアの 誇り高き軍人として、 それに従うまで。
Entry.EnglishText: And thus, on my honor as a proud soldier of Callegea, I shall obey her orders.

Entry.JapaneseText: それが正しい道ではないと 知っていながら？
Entry.EnglishText: Even though you know the path you follow is no longer righteous?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あなたがあの事件の真実を語り、 <Blue>王の盾<White>に戻ってくだされば、 こんな事にはならなかったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Had you just told the truth behind that incident and returned to the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>, things would not have come to this.

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜ…… なぜ、汚名をそそぎ、我々と共に 戦ってくださらなかったのです？
Entry.EnglishText: Why... Why did you refuse to clear your name and fight alongside us?

Entry.JapaneseText: この人は…… <Eugene>は、父の名誉を守るため、 口を閉ざしていたんです！ だから……
Entry.EnglishText: This man... <Eugene> refused to speak in order to protect my father's honor! That's why...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ワルトゥ…… おまえのやり方は…… 正しいとは言えない。
Entry.EnglishText: Walto... I cannot say that your methods or actions are correct.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが……俺もおまえも 気持ちは同じだ。
Entry.EnglishText: However, you and I are of the same sentiment.

Entry.JapaneseText: この国を守りたいという気持ち、 陛下を、そしてこの国の民を 救いたいという気持ちは……
Entry.EnglishText: Desiring to protect this kingdom as well as Her Majesty, and wanting to save the people of this nation...

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥ…… 俺たちと共に戦おう……
Entry.EnglishText: Walto... Come fight alongside us.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……その言葉が…… 聞きたかった……
Entry.EnglishText: Those are the words that I have been wanting to hear!

Entry.JapaneseText: 裏切り者……!!
Entry.EnglishText: You filthy traitor!

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa!

Entry.JapaneseText: 放せ、<Hilda>!!
Entry.EnglishText: Let me go, <Hilda>!

Entry.JapaneseText: もうやめて！ いつまでも<Blue>王の盾<White>に 縛られるのは……！
Entry.EnglishText: Stop it already! Just how long are you going to let yourself be bound to the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ…… 私も、今の世の中に 私たちの居場所なんて どこにもないと思ってた……
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa... For the longest time, I also thought that there was no place in this world for people like you and me.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、彼らが…… 私の仲間がその居場所を 作ってくれた。
Entry.EnglishText: But these guys... My friends created that place for me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 居場所は 私たちにだって作れる……
Entry.EnglishText: Together, we can create a place like that, too...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私たちの後に生まれてくる 子たちのために、 居場所を作ってあげる事が…… 私たちのすべき事じゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: ...A safe haven for the children like us who have yet to be born... Isn't that what we should be doing?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Hilda>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの名前…… 古代カレギア語で 何ていうか知ってる？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you know what your name means in Ancient Callegean?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Purple>愛って意味<White>よ……
Entry.EnglishText: It means "<Purple>Love<White>."

Entry.JapaneseText: <Purple>愛<White>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Purple>Love<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: それが、あんたが生まれた理由…… そう思わない？
Entry.EnglishText: That's the whole reason why you were born... Don't you think so?

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥ、ミリッツァを頼む。
Entry.EnglishText: Walto, take care of Militsa.

Entry.JapaneseText: 行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: 待てよ……どこに行くんだ……？ 僕にとどめを刺さないのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Hold it right there... Just where do you think you're going...? Aren't you going to finish me off?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえを殺すために ここに来たわけじゃない。
Entry.EnglishText: We didn't come here to kill you.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよそれ…… 情けをかけてるつもりかい？
Entry.EnglishText: What the hell do you mean by that... What, are you taking pity on me?

Entry.JapaneseText: フン…… 殺せ……殺せよっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph... Kill me... Just kill me already!

Entry.JapaneseText: がんばって、生きろよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't give up on life.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……行こう……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: 殺せって言ってるだろう!! こんちくしょうがぁぁぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I said kill me, damnit! Damn you all to hell!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……トーマ……
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様の命令なんだ…… 悪く思うなよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm just following Lady Zilva's orders... Don't take it personally...

Entry.JapaneseText: 用済みになったらポイね…… でも、それだけかい……？
Entry.EnglishText: So I'm being disposed of now that I'm no longer useful, is that it? Though I wonder... Is that really all there is to it?

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん……そういう事だ。 死ねぇぇ、ヒューマァァ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Heh, you got me. Time to die, Huma!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふふ……ヒューマとガジュマの 共存なんて夢物語だよね……
Entry.EnglishText: Hehe... Coexistence between Huma and Gajuma really is nothing more than a fairytale...

Entry.JapaneseText: ハハハ…… 楽しかったよ、トーマ…… これは僕からの……お礼さ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hahaha... It's been fun, Tohma... Here's a token of my... <Italic>appreciation</Italic>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐあぁぁぁッ……
Entry.EnglishText: Guaahh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……現実はこんなものさ…… <Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: This is how things really are, <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『サレとトーマ』 死んでいる……
Entry.EnglishText: - Saleh and Tohma - They're dead...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: サレ……
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh...

Entry.JapaneseText: 死ぬまで、キミは、 キミのままだったんだね……
Entry.EnglishText: Even until you died, you just kept being yourself...

Entry.JapaneseText: 同士討ちか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Was this the result of internecine strife...?
Entry.Notes: I know this is long but please understand what about "infighting" instead of internecine strife?

Entry.JapaneseText: 「志を同じくする仲間」か…… ……違うな…… この二人は、結局はこうなる 運命だったのかもしれん……
Entry.EnglishText: "Comrades who shared the same ambition..." Apparently, that wasn't the case... Perhaps it was fate that the two ended up like this.
...Life...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……命の大切さを わかってほしかったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I wish they could have come to understand the importance of life...

Entry.JapaneseText: おい……どうなってんだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hey... What the hell happened here...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……死んじまったら、 改心も償いも…… 何もできねーだろ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...If you're dead, making ammends and turning over a new leaf... Why, you can't do any of that if you're dead!

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ……
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 殺したいほど憎い相手だったけど…… 今は……何か、違う感情が わきあがってくる……
Entry.EnglishText: Even though I hated you so much I wanted to kill you... Right now, for some reason, I'm feeling something different...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、私はその感情を認めない……
Entry.EnglishText: But I'm not going to entertain those feelings...
